mapper.insert: insert into faq(faq_category, faq_title, faq_content, faq_id) values( #{faq_category}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_content}, 'admin' )

choose.when: where faq_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or faq_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.update: update faq set faq_title=#{faq_title}, faq_content=#{faq_content}, faq_category=#{faq_category} where faq_no = #{faq_no}
